sim:
Single SIM (Nano-SIM) - G8141
Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) - G8142
display_c:
- HDR10 compliant
  - Triluminos display
  - X-Reality Engine
card_slot: microSD, up to 256 GB (uses SIM 2 slot) - dual SIM model only
sound_c:
- 24-bit/192kHz audio
  - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
wlan: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot
gps: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO
messaging: SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, IM, Push Email
features_c:
- Fast battery charging (Quick Charge 3.0)
  - Xvid/MP4/H.265 player
  - MP3/eAAC+/WAV/Flac player
  - Document viewer
  - Photo/video editor
colors: Luminous Chrome, Deepsea Black, Bronze Pink, Rosso (red)
sensors: Fingerprint (side-mounted, region dependent), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, barometer, compass, color spectrum
body_c: - IP68 certified - dust/water proof over 1.5 meter and 30 minutes
primary_: 19 MP (f/2.0, 25mm, 1/2.3"), gyro EIS, predictive phase detection and laser autofocus, LED flash, check quality
features: Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, HDR, panorama
build: Front/back glass (Gorilla Glass 5), aluminum top/bottom, plastic sides
